Name: The Graffiti Creator
About the game: In The Graffiti Creator you can make your own graffiti designs. Choose different fonts, color schemes, backdrops and more. There's a ton of tools to make your artwork as realistic as possible. Endless design possibilities. When you're happy with your design you can save it and print/publish it online and show your friends. All artworks made by MindGem, a professional full-time graffiti artist of 25 years.
